description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Our gerbil friends are back and they are more foolhardy then ever!  Help them learn the impact of ropes, slingshots, bombs, disintegrators and machine guns on their slight furry forms.  Venture into heaven, hell and several places in between exploring 40 new levels, mini-games, and dastardly puzzles.  Gerbil Physics 2 is the most fun you can have with gerbils whilst still being borderline legal.
